answers.answer: That is a very general question and you don't include any information to go on. How is your blood sugar control? If you are regularly either low or high (or both) yes, that would affect your mood. I suggest you test regularly and see where your numbers are at.

question: Can A person with diabetes 2 have some mood swings from one day to another?This discussion is related to/posts/show/626377.
title: mood swings diabetes type 2
